feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - Host replacement maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 6, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 7, 16:00 UTC

Dec 27, 08:44 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

Start time : 06/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 07/01/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact is expected. Concerned hosts will be put in maintenance mode during the operation and a vMotion will be performed if it has Virtual machines in it.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will be replacing Hosted Private Cloud's hosts by new ones.
Concerned customers will receive a notification regarding the replacement of their hosts.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts maintenance notification
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 6, 08:00 UTC  -  Jan 15, 17:00 UTC

Jan 2, 08:50 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our VMware offer.

Start time : 06/01/2025 08:00 UTC
End time : 15/01/2025 17:00 UTC
Service impact : vMotion will be temporarily unavailable for 20 minutes during the operation.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an upgrade for hosts.
An individual communication will be sent before the upgrade begins.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [ERI1C][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable incident notification
entry.content:
Jan 3, 10:13 UTC
Update - An incident is currently affecting our Hosted Private Cloud offer, resulting in a temporary impact on availability of some hosts in eri1C region.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time: 03/01/2025 08:10 UTC
Impacted Service: Some Compute instances in eri1c region are unavailable.
Customers Impact: 5 hosts are currently unreachable.
Ongoing Actions: Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident and fix it. Update will be posted as significant progress is made.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Jan 3, 09:37 UTC
Investigating - We have detected an issue on one of our services. We will update informations when we will have more details.

entry.title: [RBX8][Hosted Private Cloud] - Hosts unreachable incident notification

Dec 27, 17:24 UTC
Resolved - Start Time :27/12/2024 14:30 UTC

Root cause : The incident was caused by an issue with a cooling system module.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident

As soon as the situation evolves or the incident is resolved, we will keep you informed.

entry.title: [GLOBAL][Hosted Private Cloud] - SSL Gateway maintenance notification
entry.content:

Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.
All services are operational.

Dec 16, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 10, 22:53 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted Private Cloud offer.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 16/12/2024 16:00 UTC
End time : 20/12/2024 19:00 UTC
Service impact : vCenter will be temporarily unavailable for 2 hours during the operation.
Impacted customers will be directly informed by mail.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our Hosted Private Cloud offer, we will perform an operation on deployments of the GatewaySSL VMs.
Please note that you can reschedule this migration by your own.

Thank you for your understanding.

entry.title: [CA/FR][Hosted Private Cloud] - Veeam Maintenance
entry.content:

End time : 17/12/2024 15:00 UTC
All services are operational again.

Dec 16, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Dec 15, 08:55 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our infrastructure.

This may temporarily affect availability.

Start time : 16/12/2024 07:00 UTC
End time : 17/12/2024 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Veeam Enterprise service will be unavailable during operations.
Maintenance will begin with Canada on 16/12/2024 13:00 UTC and in France, it will begin on 17/12/2024 at 10:00 UTC.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we need to upgrade Veeam Enterprise.

Thank you for your understanding.

Thank you for your understanding.
